title: 7 Minutes. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: June 26th, 2015

Description:

After becoming indebted to a psychopathic drug lord, three desperate young men are forced to commit a brazen robbery. The feature film debut from celebrated music video director Jay Martin, this stylish and fast-paced crime thriller stars Luke Mitchell (TV's AGENTS OF S.H.I.E.L.D), Jason Ritter (TV's GIRLS), Leven Rambin (TV's TRUE DETECTIVE), Kris Kristofferson (BLADE franchise, WATCHMEN), Zane Holtz (TV's FROM DUSK TILL DAWN), and Joel Murray (GOD BLESS AMERICA).
